Enact the Respiratory Care Interstate Compact
Amend laws related to the retrocession of jurisdiction over federal lands
Repeal termination date on reporting and disclosure of violence against health care employees

Revise laws relating to the state lottery and review authority
Revising laws related to dental anesthesia inspections
Revise provider rate laws for physical therapists, speech-language pathologists, and occupational therapists
Revise labor laws relating to employers and public service
Revising alcohol law to prohibit certain licensees from offering gambling
